product_name: Salomon S-Lab Insulated Hydration Belt Set
long_description: Ideal for cold weather training or Nordic ski races, this lightweight, formfitting hydration belt prevents freezing and keeps essentials in reach while you push the limits on powder-filled trails.
short_description: Ideal for cold weather training or Nordic ski races, this lightweight, formfitting hydration belt prevents freezing and keeps essentials in reach while you push the limits on powder-filled trails.
